titleStmt.title: The seconde parte of the booke called a Bucklar of the Catholyke fayeth conteyninge seuen chapiters / made by Rychard Smyth doctoure of diuinitie of Oxforde, & reader of the same there.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Richard, 1500-1563.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.
